import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './styles.scss'; import img from '../../images/search.png' import booksData from '../../data/books.json'; import Book from './Book'; const BookListPage = () => { const [books, setBooks] = useState([]); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { setBooks(booksData.books); }, []); const filteredBooks = books.filter(book => book.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); return (
setSearchTerm(event.target.value)}/>
